welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Huckelhoven, Germany! Prepare to be charmed by our quaint city known for its friendly locals and beautiful countryside. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Huckelhoven has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Geilenkirchen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Maastricht/aachen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Maastricht/aachen Airport, mainly used for charter and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited bandwidth during peak hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Moenchen-gl. - Dus Exp Airport, handling all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Moenchen-gl. - Dus Exp Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kempen Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kempen Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
